string.Data: レシート用紙おチェックしてください。

string.Data: <font color="#ff7200"><u>Click to see the paper installation tutorial.</u></font>

resources.string: プリンターが過熱です。少々お待ちください。
The print head is cooled down,\n and ready for use.
プリンターが起動していますが、少々お待ちください。
The printer upgrade is finished,\n and ready for use.
Fail to update the printer.Please restart the machine to update again \n or connect the reseller for repair
The printer cover is not closed, please close the cover.
The printer cover is not completely closed, please close the cover.
Printer cutter error, please fix it manually.
The printer cutter has been repaired,\nplease re-open the printer paper cover.
No User guide or versions are not available.
レシート用紙がチェックしてください。
The black label was not detected,Please check!
Setting the final output of the printer will cover the Settings of the APP for printing effect.
Will affect print output layout, please use caution.
When the line height is less than the character height, the line height will be set to the character height.

The font contained in the block are all equal-width characters. Characters not included in the block will use the Android default font. Chinese characters are all equal in width. Different font sizes and heights are different.
Font Blocks: Basic Latin, Latin Supplements, Latin Expansion, Greek and Coptic, Greek Expansion, Cyrillic, Punctuation, etc.
Font blocks: basic Latin, Chinese characters, Japanese and Korean, punctuation, etc.
Different fonts support the number of characters, thickness, height, width, will affect the print effect and print layout, please choose carefully!

Function description：\nThe black label sensor has a distance from the cutter in the physical structure, and the black label will pass through the sensor first, then the cutter (such as the black label detection position) will be passed.\nAfter the black label is detected by the printer, the paper will be carried out according to the value saved by the user to determine the location of the last cut and the distance of the black mark on the black label paper.

Baidu take-out test cases
Expect delivery time:immediate delivery
Order notes:Send to Sunmi and do not spicy, stir fry.Please add a bottle of cola, a pack of seeds, and to help throwing rubbish. Knocks at home when coming.
